string.name: q1
string.b: The five rings on the Olympic flag are interlocking?

resources.string: Mount Kilimanjaro is the highest mountain in the world?
A group of swans is known as a bevy?
Sydney is the capital of Australia?
The Penny Black is an old-fashioned coin?
The star sign Capricorn is represented by a goat?
Seahorses have no teeth or stomach?
Nepal is the only country in the world which does not have a rectangular flag?
